QuestData.Title: Deep Despair
QuestData.Description: There is more to this naga problem than meets the eye, $c. It appears that the issue will not be resolved by merely thinning their numbers. To humble them, a more severe impression must be made.$b$bTravel to the northern end of Zoram Strand and enter Blackfathom Deep. Once there, demonstrate to the naga that their presence in this region will no longer be tolerated!
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello again, $r.$b$bHave you shown the naga the might of the Horde?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent!$b$bLet the naga retreat back into the seas where they belong!
